channel.title: Error at logging out [Will Rep]
channel.description:
Whenever a player logs out, it shows that error :/
[CODE][10/25/11 9:32 AM]: java.lang.NullPointerException [10/25/11 9:32 AM]: at server.model.players.Highscores.destroy(Highscores.ja va:54) [10/25/11 9:32 AM]: at server.model.players.Highscores.query(Highscores.java :44) [10/25/11 9:32 AM]: at server.model.players.Highscores.save(Highscores.java: 66) [10/25/11 9:32 AM]: at server.model.players.Client.logout(Client.java:630) [10/25/11 9:32 AM]: at server.model.players.packets.ClickingButtons.processP acket(ClickingButtons.java:1335) [10/25/11 9:32 AM]: at server.model.players.PacketHandler.processPacket(Pack etHandler.java:137) [10/25/11 9:32 AM]: at server.model.players.Client.processQueuedPackets(Clie nt.java:1341) [10/25/11 9:32 AM]: at server.model.players.PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHand ler.java:140) [10/25/11 9:32 AM]: at server.Server.main(Server.java:190) [10/25/11 9:33 AM]: java.lang.NullPointerException [10/25/11 9:33 AM]: at server.model.players.Highscores.destroy(Highscores.ja va:54) [10/25/11 9:33 AM]: at server.model.players.Highscores.query(Highscores.java :44) [10/25/11 9:33 AM]: at server.model.players.Highscores.save(Highscores.java: 68) [10/25/11 9:33 AM]: at server.model.players.Client.logout(Client.java:630) [10/25/11 9:33 AM]: at server.model.players.packets.ClickingButtons.processP acket(ClickingButtons.java:1335) [10/25/11 9:33 AM]: at server.model.players.PacketHandler.processPacket(Pack etHandler.java:137) [10/25/11 9:33 AM]: at server.model.players.Client.processQueuedPackets(Clie nt.java:1341) [10/25/11 9:33 AM]: at server.model.players.PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHand ler.java:140) [10/25/11 9:33 AM]: at server.Server.main(Server.java:190) [10/25/11 9:33 AM]: Game saved for player test [10/25/11 9:33 AM]: [LOGGED OUT]: test[/CODE]
My highscores.java: [url=http://paste.rune-server.org/2555]Rune-Server Official Pastebin[/url]
Please help.

item.title: Error at logging out [Will Rep]
item.dc:creator: @Sagi Sagi
item.description:
@Sagi wrote:

:facepalm: Tell me the cause of the error, get me fix it, and I’ll rep you. Stop acting like a fag…
